title: If We Don't Get A Candy Kayne Skin For Christmas I Quit

replies.body:
Hey,

Because this thread has already been up awhile and generated positive attention, I will leave it up and unlocked. However, for future posts skin ideas are best posted in the [Concepts & Creations](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts) section. Gameplay is specifically for serious discussion about the game.

#Community: Riot, please give us Candy Kayn!

#Riot: https://img.fireden.net/v/image/1489/58/1489580701168.gif

#Community: Pleeeaaaaaase?

#Riot: https://media.tenor.com/images/795e9e1851c8def228d766a8c772dad8/tenor.gif

#Community: http://reactiongifs.me/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/happy-carlton-banks-excited-the-fresh-prince-of-bel-air.gif

#Riot: SNOW BUNNY AHRI LEGENDARY IS NOW OUT MERRY CHRISTMAS

#Community: https://img.memecdn.com/my-reaction-when-i-knew-the-answer-but-didnt-raise-my-hand_o_758134.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ANeAvYnz,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-09-25T04:12:39.171+0000)
>
> #Riot: SNOW BUNNY AHRI ULTIMATE IS NOW OUT MERRY CHRISTMAS
> 
> #Community: https://img.memecdn.com/my-reaction-when-i-knew-the-answer-but-didnt-raise-my-hand_o_758134.gif



FIFY
It would be about time for her to have ultimate. I mean, it's year 2017 and Ahri still doesn't have five legendary skins, three ultimate ones and one transcendental skin. Riot so slow.
I think someone on toplane will get ultimate skin
So.... Ahri?

{{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} 

Rito pls
{{champion:39}}
Think of the rule 34. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

What's rule 34? If there's a skin type/skin theme, Ahri will fit the theme?
 ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ANeAvYnz,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-09-25T04:12:39.171+0000)
>
> #Community: Riot, please give us Candy Kayn!

id nut for SNOW BUNNY AHRI

kayn kayn kayn kayn 
there is no fucking e
kayn kayn
Lawl. U rite.
Candy kanye (w)rapper skin plox.

Is that two puns in one


I approve
I had someone call the enemy Kayn, Kahn. While they also had a Rakan. (Voice speak mind you) Shit confused the fuck out of me
Your name is priceless
Please add the picturehttp://i.imgur.com/iWHervs.jpg [http://i.imgur.com/iafzQJr.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/iafzQJr.jpg)
He needs flowing hair though, or whats even the point of choosing Shadow Assassin!?!
Oh god... I want this now.
That's sweet! Deliciously sweet...
10/10 would buy without even thinking about it.

Riot's Skins team: Okay, we will give you Candy Kayn for Christmas : ^). But you didn't say it had to be *this* Christmas, so you're still going to be playing for a while.
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
It will have to be NEXT Christmas.  Most new champions don't get a skin for at least a year, and they generally take 6 months to a year to concept, design, animate and overall finish a skin.
and, on top of that, kayn is in that list of champ who have multiple assets to work on for just one skin
Three models, three set of VFX, three sets of delicious shirtless mus... sorry I lost myself.
If we don't get a western/cowboy theme skin called "Kayn West" I quit.

> [{quoted}](name=Sun Goddess,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ANeAvYnz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-09-25T01:49:07.940+0000)
>
> If we don't get a western/cowboy theme skin called "Kayn West" I quit.

Rito pls

"Now all I need is y'all to pronounce my name 
It's Kanye, but some of my plaques, they still say Kayne!"
They have talked about this in one of their Ask Riot's The problem here would be localization because not all languages can make this pun. It would be meaningless for many.
Can they all make the pun Meowkai? I'm pretty sure there are other pun skin titles, did they just conveniently work in every other language on the planet?

There is a difference between words and vocalizations because all of them can be grammatically cased to fit in almost every language existing.

You can use Meow and turn it into Mjau, Mjäu, Myao or whatever the fuck and put Mjaokai (according to X language) and it'll work.
So why does 90% of Vlad's VO exist?

Because those are subjective puns. It's not always a conjunction with a word.

For example: When Malphite says "Rock solid." it conveys the same funny message to many people. Hell, it even sounds funnier in my language and enforces the joke.

It's propably not meant to be a dirty joke but still.

But something like "100% Garentee" is not allowed because GAarantee is not Guarantee in every language.
still waiting on that Christmas EVE-lynn skin...
Why does everyone want a joke skin when he doesn't have any good skins yet. Soulhunter is subpar and I want something that will actually make kayn look good.
That's a sweet idea for a skin
His scythe could be a giant candy cane and his orbs could be little candies.
When people realize that Kayn wont be getting any new skins because they'd have to make 3 models

riot: we hear you on the lack of candy cane champions so were releasing new skins just in time for the new year.

{{champion:11}} Were proud to announce candy cane yi given his recent lack of skins for his player base i hope you guys enjoy.
Unfortunately, Riot needs to do Sugar Kayn first, because you can't make a Candy Kayn without a Sugar Kayn earlier in the process.
Grim reaper skin for Halloween first
Knowing riot, they'll name it candy cane kayn
That sounds stupid as fuck and I really hope he doesn't get the gimmick/joke skins.
Reapear kayn {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Candy Kayn and Candy Cornn for next year's april fools
{{champion:75}} someone say candy cane?
{{champion:75}} Candy Cane?
Not happening. Too new. Hopefully next year though. Only issue I see is if a company owns the rights to candy canes. Which nowadays depressingly might be a thing.
I want a Pimp Kayn. He struts around the rift smacking up his bitches. The blue/red souls are replaced with moneys.
